title: No summoner icon for anniversary
body:
Hey Riot I know you guys are super busy making and keeping this game awsome, I got my riot kayle skin and thanks for that its sick! but we were told to make a ticket if we didnt get our icon by the 23rd and i still havent. i know you guys are doing your best to get em out and we all appreciate that like i said tho we were told to make a ticket if we didnt get it yet and so here it is 
Thanks again riot you guys rock!

replies.body: Gifts are still being sent out, and you won't get everything all at once.  Per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), they are being sent out individually and will take some time to gift every eligible account.  Hang tight!
